Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Sheridan/Cuyler
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Broadway, Irving Park and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Cuyler.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Broadway, Irving Park and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Cuyler.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near Racine. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity near Racine.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
